favourite.article: There is a much better tune, and the ONLY one I've encountered in 50 years as an O&CM. It is WELSH and I don't have access to my Cymanfa Ganu hymnal but the «code» begins: 321171233 5434321 :] Another Welsh tune which suits the text quite well is PRYSGOL.
This hymn really ministered to me in a time of great sorrow.
